definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Unicode/also written 統一碼|统一码

sentences.english: Although solitary accessory spleen is not uncommon, multiple accessory spleens are rare.
sentences.chinese: 雖然單一性副脾並非不常見，但多發性副脾仍屬少見。

sentences.english: A Single Con Panna is a delicious coffee drink that's easy to make.
sentences.chinese: 一個單一濃度潘納是一種美味的咖啡飲料，很容易使。

sentences.english: After P3 generation, cells presented in uniform morphology.
sentences.chinese: P3代以後，細胞形態較單一。

sentences.english: In method of thinking, absolutes and singleness must be avoided.
sentences.chinese: 在思想方法上說，應該避免絕對化，單一化。

sentences.english: Farm irrigation from these free-flowing bodies is the biggest single human use of freshwater.
sentences.chinese: 自由流通水體的農場灌溉是人們最大的淡水單一使用。

sentences.english: Master-detail views can be implemented across multiple pages or on individual ones.
sentences.chinese: 這種程式在單一頁面或多頁切換時都可實現。

sentences.english: The velocity distributions previously shown were for a single angle of attack.
sentences.chinese: 先前的速度分佈列分別爲單一迎角。

sentences.english: Raceme separation is the main rout for preparation of pure enantiomers.
sentences.chinese: 外消旋體拆分是獲得單一手性化合物的重要途徑。

sentences.english: It is effectively a way to overcome the limitation of single-inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 這是繞過單一繼承限制的一個有效途徑。

sentences.english: Job options have become much wider and less geared to a single work-unit.
sentences.chinese: 人們面對更多的工作機會，不受限於單一的工作單位。

sentences.english: He had to singel-crop on his plot.
sentences.chinese: 在他那小塊土地上，他只能採用單一耕種法。

sentences.english: Power will be provided by a single turbofan engine.
sentences.chinese: 電力將提供一個單一的渦扇發動機。

sentences.english: The new system is made of single amphoteric surfactant and clay stabilizer.
sentences.chinese: 該體系由單一兩性表面活性劑和黏土穩定劑組成。

sentences.english: Customers from a single point of view constitute a multi-sensory effects.
sentences.chinese: 讓客戶從單一角度構成多層次的感官效果。

sentences.english: The schoolwork weighs heavily on the students of traditional Chinese medicine colleges and universities;
sentences.chinese: 中醫院校大學生的課業負擔較重，生活相對單一。

sentences.english: that's what I describe for a single vibrational mode of, say, a molecule.
sentences.chinese: 那是我對單一振動模式，例如一個分子的描述。

definition: to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
